title: TDC receives $6.7 billion takeover offer from Macquarie-led consortium
text:
20 PM / Updated 9 minutes ago TDC receives $6.7 billion takeover offer from Macquarie-led consortium Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
COPENHAGEN (Reuters) - Danish telecoms company TDC ( TDC.CO ) has received a $6.65 billion (4.80 billion pounds) takeover offer for all its shares from Australia’s Macquarie and three Danish pension funds and recommended that shareholders accept the offer. 
“After careful review of our options, the board of directors of TDC believes that the consortium’s offer represents both the most compelling value and the highest transaction certainty benefiting the TDC shareholders,” TDC Chairman Pierre Danon said in a statement. Reporting by Stine Jacobsen; Editing by David Goodman
